Magic Notes:
Aura: Visible to Detect Chaos/Evil/Good/Law based on deity alignment
Empowered Evil: +1 caster level on Evil spells
Empowered Law: +1 caster level on Law spells
Maximize Spell: Maximize all chosen spell variable effects uses +3 spell slot
Spontaneous Cleric Spell: Cast Cure or Inflict in place of known spell
